description.default:
Her breasts are bountiful, impossibly large, too big to hold with both hands. Shaped like teardrops, they spill to each side when she lies down.
 Incredibly soft, yet firm, her tummy is toned and defined, with no ribs in sight.
description.en:
Her breasts are bountiful, impossibly large, too big to hold with both hands. Shaped like teardrops, they spill to each side when she lies down.
 Incredibly soft, yet firm, her tummy is toned and defined, with no ribs in sight.
description.es:
Sus pechos son abundantes, increíblemente grandes, tan grandes que no puede sujetar uno con ambas manos.
Con forma de lágrima, se derraman hacia los lados cuando se acuesta. Increíblemente suaves, pero firmes, su abdomen está tonificado y definido, sin una costilla a la vista.
description.ja:
彼女の胸は豊満で、信じられないほど大きく、両手で持ちきれない。涙のような形をしており、彼女が横になると両側に広がる。非常に柔らかいが、しっかりしている。
お腹は引き締まっており、肋骨は見えない。
description.pt:
Seus seios são abundantes, incrivelmente grandes, grandes demais para segurar com ambas as mãos.
Com formato de lágrima, derramam-se para os lados quando ela se deita. Incrivelmente macios, mas firmes, sua barriga é tonificada e definida, sem uma costela à vista.
